name: read_file
description: Reads the full content of a specified file. Access is restricted to predefined allowed directories (e.g., data/, docs/). Cannot read files outside these areas.

file_path.description: The relative or absolute path to the file to read.

success.description: True if the file was read successfully, False otherwise.

content.description: The content of the file if successful, otherwise null.

error.description: An error message if unsuccessful (e.g., 'Access Denied', 'File Not Found'), otherwise null.
